        Parameters:
        tableName - - the table / view whose columns to fetch
        crashOnDuplicates - - whether to throw exception in case the table/view has duplicate names

      • insert

        public static void insert(java.sql.Connection conn,
                          java.lang.String tableName,
                          java.lang.String idColumnName,
                          java.lang.String seqName,
                          java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> colNames,
                          java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.Object>> values)
        inserts, as fastly as possible, a series of rows into a table
        Parameters:
        conn - - the connection to use
        tableName - - the table to insert into
        idColumnName - - the name if the id column, might be null IFF seqname is also null
        seqName - - the name of the sequence giving values to the id column. should be null if idColumnName is null
        colNames - - the names of the columns to insert into
        values - - a series of rows. each of them should have exactle colNames.size() rows
